actions: Rebaseline runway with two scenarios (base/downside); lock weekly cash cadence.
Tighten ICP and pricing; add a ‘no-discount’ approval gate for large deals.
Ship 2–3 proof points (case studies, benchmarks) to de-risk next raise.
implications: Down-round risk rises without clear growth narrative; extend runway via efficiency + pricing discipline.
GTM must be instrumented; conversion + retention trump pipeline volume.
signals: VC Daily Snapshot: funding activity clustered in fewer rounds; higher bar for revenue quality.
VC Daily Snapshot: buyers compressing budgets; procurement scrutiny increasing.
VC Daily Snapshot: hiring demand tilting toward GTM efficiency and platform engineering.
watchlist: Category multiples vs. growth rates (public comps).
Sales cycle length and late-stage pipeline slippage.
Churn/expansion by cohort; gross margin trend.
